settings.title: FAQs
settings.subheading: You can find the answers to the most common questions we get asked by our customers with our FAQ

settings.title: What are the shipping charges to my location?
settings.text:
INDIA: Free Shipping when online payment mode is chosen. For Cash on Delivery, shipping charge is Flat Rs 49.

OUTSIDE INDIA: Shipping charges are Rs 999 per item.

settings.title: What is the Cancellation Policy?
settings.text: Currently we don't allow cancellation for the Orders placed, but you can return the products once they are shipped. Click here to learn more about the return policy.

settings.title: What if I want to return/exchange the product:
settings.text: Read more about our refund policy here.

settings.title: What are the currency available for shopping on the website?
settings.text: You can shop on the website in INR (Indian Rupee).

settings.title: Do product prices vary from country to country?
settings.text: The product price remains same irrespective of the country you shop from. Only the shipping prices change depending upon your delivery location.

settings.title: How much time will it take for my product to get delivered?
settings.text:
All shipments (In India & Worldwide) are delivered in 7-10 business days once the order is received by us.


In case of order placed for nameplate the team will get in touch with you for customization required, it generally takes 7-15 business days to get delivered.

settings.title: After placing the order, I didn’t receive any confirmation on email/phone:
settings.text: Please check your spam/promotions folder. If the issue persists, send us an email at customercare@smris.com

settings.title: What payment options are available for me?
settings.text:
INDIA: Credit & Debit Cards, Google Pay, UPI, Net Banking.

Other Countries: Please contact support number via Whatsapp

settings.title: Are there any taxes and customs duties that I have to pay?
settings.text: No, all the customs duties and taxes are borne by Smri's.

settings.title: What if I want to buy in wholesale or for reselling?
settings.text: We have a separate team that will help you with such orders. Email at customercare@smris.com to get in touch with our sales team.

settings.title: What is an SKU code?
settings.text: Each product on the website has a unique code attached to it. You can view the SKU code of the product by visiting the product page.

settings.title: I'm not able to complete payment via Paypal. What can I do?
settings.text: You need to add INR as a currency in your Paypal account for initiating payments.

settings.title: I still have a question, what can I do?
